strengthTone.title: Strong Body Without Jumps. Pilates
strengthTone.description: Firm figure without overload - through pilates
strengthTone.extendedDescription:
Don't like running, jumping and exhausting cardio? Pilates is a gentle, safe and effective way to get your body in shape:

We burn fat and build definition â€” without overloading joints.


We strengthen pelvic, abdominal and stabilizer muscles â€” for a flat stomach and beautiful posture.


Stretching and breathing â€” improves mobility and overall well-being.

8 workouts of 30 minutes each â€” gentle but effective,
body in tone from the first week.

steelAbs.title: Steel Abs
steelAbs.extendedDescription: Want a flat stomach, definition and abs that people will turn to look at? This program works fast and effectively. From the very first workouts, the "pouch" disappears and the stomach becomes stronger. The core engages, muscles begin to form definition and abs. The back straightens â€” goodbye slouching and heaviness. Arms tighten up â€” no flabbiness or cellulite. You notice the first changes after just a few sessions. What's inside:

muscles

footer.title: Don't know where to start?
footer.description: Write to me on WhatsApp â€” I'll help you choose a program and answer all your questions.
footer.brandDescription: I help women regain a sense of strength and lightness in their body through personal training and thoughtful programs: without unnecessary stress, with attention to technique and results.

cta.title: Hello, my name is Lilia!
cta.description:
I am a certified fitness trainer, and I'm here so you can finally feel: "I control my body".

I conduct training in Pilates, TRX and Tabata directions â€” both online and in person. I work with women who are tired of feeling weakness, heaviness, instability in their body and in life. My goal is not just to get you in shape, but to help you regain control, energy and confidence. Each program is tailored to your goals, capabilities and lifestyle.

qualifications.title: Certificates
qualifications.description: I constantly learn and improve to give you only the best and most modern methods.

testimonials.title: Client Testimonials
testimonials.quote1: "I never felt so strong! Lilia gently but demandingly guided me, explained technique and supported me every step of the way. Minus 7 kg and a completely different body feeling â€” I recommend!"
testimonials.quote2: "One-on-one sessions with Lilia were exactly what I was missing. No doubts or chaos: clear plan, attention to technique and support at every step. Minus 6 kg in a month and feeling of strength and control over my body â€” I'm delighted!"
testimonials.quote4: "In 2 months with Lilia I not only lost 8 kg, but completely changed my attitude towards sports. Now training is not torture, but pleasure. My body became toned and my mood â€” excellent!"
testimonials.quote5: "Lilia helped me recover after childbirth. In 3 months I returned to my previous shape and even became better! Exercises are adapted to my condition, support is constant. I highly recommend!"
testimonials.quote6: "The result exceeded all expectations! In a month with Lilia I lost 5 kg and gained incredible self-confidence. Every workout is a step towards a better version of myself!"
testimonials.quote7: "Lilia is a true professional! She helped me not only lose weight, but also fall in love with sports. Now I feel energetic and happy every day!"
testimonials.quote8: "Thanks to Lilia, I realized that sports can be enjoyable. In 2 months I changed not only externally, but also internally. Thank you so much for your support!"
testimonials.quote9: "Lilia helped me believe in myself! Result in a month â€” minus 6 kg and a completely new attitude towards my body. I recommend to everyone who wants to change their life!"
testimonials.quote10: "In 3 months with Lilia I became a different person. Not only lost 7 kg, but also gained inner strength and confidence. This is the best investment in myself!"
testimonials.quote11: "Lilia is not just a trainer, but a true mentor! In just 1 month I not only lost 4 kg, but completely changed my lifestyle. Now I feel energetic and happy every day!"
testimonials.quote12: "Thanks to Lilia I realized that sports is not punishment, but pleasure! In a month and a half I lost 5 kg and gained incredible confidence in myself. Every workout is a step to a better version of myself!"

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: What tasks can be solved with me?
faq.answer1:
Lose weight
Get definition and develop strength
Strengthen the cardiovascular system
Adjust nutrition and lifestyle forever
Recover after childbirth: lose weight, gain lightness and flexibility in the body
faq.question2: Who are my programs suitable for?
faq.answer2:
If you don't have time for long workouts and constant trips to the gym
If you can't gather strength and start exercising
If you started before but quit due to lack of motivation
If you feel tired, anxious and stressed and don't know how to change it
If you want to exercise but don't know where to start and how to train properly
If you need support and a simple plan that will really fit into your life
If you want to exercise at home or in the gym, but you need a flexible and understandable approach
faq.answer3:
All workouts are online, but this is not a recording or group session.
This is a format where only you and the trainer.
1 on 1. No distractions. Only your result.

This is practically non-existent on the market.
I am completely with you in every session:
âœ… I see everything
âœ… I control the technique
âœ… I select exercises specifically for you
âœ… I know when you can do more â€” and gently lead you there

I studied a lot and went through it myself â€” I know from my own example how to restore shape quickly and effectively.
And most importantly â€” how to love sports without stress, without tension, every day.
faq.answer4: All classes can be conducted at home, without complex equipment. The course provides a list and recommendations for purchase or free home alternatives.

nutritionConsultation.title: Nutrition Consultation
features: Analysis of your real nutrition for 3 or 7 days
Macro analysis (calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates)
Where you overeat, even "on a diet"
What really interferes â€” not a sandwich, but protein or sleep deficiency
Advice on what and how to change â€” without strict restrictions
Water, coffee, stress, breakdowns â€” we'll take everything into account

groupTraining.title: Nutrition Analysis: Let's Break Down 7 Days
groupTraining.description: Stop guessing why the diet isn't working. We'll analyze your real nutrition and show where the hidden mistakes are:
groupTraining.intro: Stop guessing why the diet isn't working. We'll analyze your real nutrition and show where the hidden mistakes are:

points.nutritionBreakdown: Nutrition breakdown â€” detailed for 7 days.
points.macroAnalysis: Macro analysis â€” calories, proteins, fats, carbohydrates.
points.hiddenOvereating: Hidden overeating â€” even "on a diet" you might be eating more than you think.
points.realReasons: Real reasons for breakdown â€” not a sandwich, but lack of protein, sleep or stress.
points.practicalAdvice: Practical advice â€” what and how to change without strict restrictions.
points.allFactors: Accounting for all factors â€” water, coffee, stress, breakdowns â€” we won't miss anything.

groupTraining.result: Result: understanding your nutrition, simple adjustments and real steps to your goal without stress and restrictions.

totalReset.title: Total Reset: Body and Mind Reboot
totalReset.description: This is not a course or training. This is a transformation program where I take you by the hand and change everything: body, habits, mindset.
totalReset.intro: This is not a course or training. This is a transformation program where I take you by the hand and change everything: body, habits, mindset.

changes.body: Body â€” strength, functional and breathing practices. Stomach tightens, definition appears, swelling goes away.
changes.mindset: Mindset â€” we learn to remove sabotage, turn on discipline and confidence.
changes.habits: Habits â€” early rise, exercise, running, sleep and nutrition control.
changes.nutrition: Nutrition â€” no "diet", only a system that will fit into life.
changes.energy: Energy and focus â€” meditations and breathing practices relieve stress and restore balance.
changes.inner: Inner attitude â€” affirmations and mindset work change self-image and accelerate results.

inside.training: 8 personal training sessions of 40 minutes â€” minimum time, maximum effect.
inside.coaching: 4 coaching sessions: about habits, mindset, goals and energy.
inside.meditation: Meditations and affirmations â€” for concentration, calm and confidence.
inside.support: Personal support and daily reminders â€” you're always in touch with the coach.

totalReset.result: âœ¨ In 30 days you will have not only a toned body, but also a new mindset: you get up earlier, eat consciously, move more and feel confident every day.

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: I am a certified fitness trainer. I help women regain strength, lightness and confidence through personal training and clear programs that fit into real life.
about.story1: My fitness journey began more than 10 years ago. I went through my own transformations and became convinced how regular training and adequate nutrition change the body, well-being and mood.
about.story2: Today I work with women of different fitness levels: from beginners to those who return to sports after a break. I carefully guide, explain technique and give only what really works.
about.story3: The basis of my programs is a personal approach, competent load progression and attention to details. Each workout is adapted to your goals, resources and life rhythm.
about.philosophy: "Fitness is not about comparing yourself to others. It's about daily small steps towards a strong and healthy self. My task is to be nearby: monitor technique, give clear tasks and support at every stage, so that the result is not accidental, but sustainable."
